item.title: Naomi Scott - Speechless
item.description:
For educational use. Created with letter names so any non-transposing instrument can play along. Key of Em.
Chords Used: Em, Hawaiian D7, C, D, G, Bsus4, B, Am, Bm7
Original performance by Naomi Scott, from the (2019) motion picture "Aladdin"
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature only video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (GCEA chords & Strumming/Finger Picking): https://youtu.be/aH4_OQ2pNiI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!
